Summary: Star-like object in the Northeast sky over Philadelphia/Bucks County
divs: sighting detailsi was just about to sit down in my backyard w\ a drink at 5pm. before sitting down and drinking, i looked to the northeast sky and saw a star-like object in the sky. i watched it for a minute and it did not move. i quickly got my binoculars to look at it but it was too far away to see any details. since it remained in the same position, i went and got my camera. i was able to take one picture of it. after taking a picture, i lost sight of it and it disappeared.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around August 16th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
